Welcome to the Frontend Tech site

This site started off as a place to go for new starters to get an introduction to some off the technologies used in the company.

When I initially started to learn and try to find out more about some of the technolgies, I found that although there were lots of resources out there (some good and some not so good), it can sometimes be overwhelming.

What I have tried to do here, is to put together something taken from several sites (or just one good site in cases) in the hope that it will be a good introduction to a new technology for the reader and a good starting point for them to learn more about it.

Why Frontend Technology is an exciting area to be in

The Frontend Technology ecosystem is constantly changing and evolving which means it is a necessity that you keep up to date with the latest developments and be prepared to learn new skills and technologies and to put them into practice.

An excellent place to go to keep up to date is a site called Medium.
